description: Lists the Outpost sites for your Amazon Web Services account. Use filters to return specific results. Use filters to return specific results. If you specify multiple filters, the results include only the resources that match all of the specified filters. For a filter where you can specify multiple values, the results include items that match any of the values that you specify for the filter.

parameters.name: OperatingAddressCountryCodeFilter
parameters.description: Filters the results by country code. (string) ---

parameters.name: OperatingAddressStateOrRegionFilter
parameters.description: Filters the results by state or region. (string) ---

nested_items.name: Sites
nested_items.description: Information about the sites.

nested_items.name: SiteId
nested_items.description: The ID of the site.

nested_items.name: AccountId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the site.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the site.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: SiteArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the site.

nested_items.name: Notes
nested_items.description: Notes about a site.

nested_items.name: OperatingAddressCountryCode
nested_items.description: The ISO-3166 two-letter country code where the hardware is installed and powered on.

nested_items.name: OperatingAddressStateOrRegion
nested_items.description: State or region where the hardware is installed and powered on.

nested_items.name: OperatingAddressCity
nested_items.description: City where the hardware is installed and powered on.

nested_items.name: RackPhysicalProperties
nested_items.description: Information about the physical and logistical details for a rack at the site.

nested_items.name: PowerDrawKva
nested_items.description: The power draw available at the hardware placement position for the rack.

nested_items.name: PowerPhase
nested_items.description: The power option that you can provide for hardware.

nested_items.name: PowerConnector
nested_items.description: The power connector for the hardware.

nested_items.name: PowerFeedDrop
nested_items.description: The position of the power feed.

nested_items.name: UplinkGbps
nested_items.description: The uplink speed the rack supports for the connection to the Region.

nested_items.name: UplinkCount
nested_items.description: The number of uplinks each Outpost network device.

nested_items.name: FiberOpticCableType
nested_items.description: The type of fiber used to attach the Outpost to the network.

nested_items.name: OpticalStandard
nested_items.description: The type of optical standard used to attach the Outpost to the network. This field is dependent on uplink speed, fiber type, and distance to the upstream device. For more information about networking requirements for racks, see Network in the Amazon Web Services Outposts User Guide.

nested_items.name: MaximumSupportedWeightLbs
nested_items.description: The maximum rack weight that this site can support. NO_LIMIT is over 2000 lbs (907 kg).

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token.
